Description: Sandstone figured ostracon with representation of standing Bes figure, incised and black-painted.
Excavator/field collector: Excavated by: Sir Robert Ludwig Mond
Bibliographic references: Mond & Myers 1934 / The Bucheum (2:74, pl. LXXVII (no. 203))
Additional IDs: Miscellaneous number: O.Buch. 203 (text edition abbreviation according to Oates et al 2001)
